title: 213: Living Life By Your Own Rules with Amy Jo Martin
itunes:title: 213: Living Life By Your Own Rules with Amy Jo Martin
description:
There is no one version of success-- it may be writing a NYT best-selling book, it may be quitting your job and moving into the forest, it may be working with Shaq or it may be selling all your belongings and living on a boat. Amy Jo Martin has experienced all four. In this episode, we discuss the importance of listening to your heart, having a meditation practice and knowing WHY you are choosing the life you live-- and how your reality is a result of your DECISION!

Check out Amy Jo Martin’s work at AmyJoMartin.com @AmyJoMartin.

Head off to lolibeauty.com and use coupon code "sahara" to get 20% off

Get 20% off your Organifi Green Juice + Adaptogenic Superfood blends at organifi.com with coupon code "sahara"

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Discover your Dosha and receive custom results for your mind and body with my free quiz at eatfeelfresh.com/new-quiz

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at: Instagram.com/iamsahararose
Facebook.com/iamsahararose Twitter.com/iamsahararose

Order My Books Eat Feel Fresh + Idiot's Guide to Ayurveda: https://www.iamsahararose.com/books
